text: was a Japanese manga artist. He was born in Sakaiminato, Tottori. Mizuki was mostly known for his Japanese horror manga GeGeGe no Kitarō. Mizuki died from a heart attack in Tokyo, Japan, aged 93.Kitaro, NonNonBâ Manga Creator Shigeru Mizuki Passes Away == References == == Other websites == *"Drawing from Experience", Japan Times, February 6, 2005, last accessed in March 22, 2012. *Mizuki Production website *Sakaiminato: The town where you can meet Kitaro *Shigeru Mizuki Road, Shigeru Mizuki Museum , photos *Japan Focus: War and Japan: The Non-Fiction Manga of Mizuki Shigeru * Category:1922 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Japanese manga artists Category:Japanese military people Category:Military personnel of World War II Category:People from Tottori Prefecture
